name: source_column_name
description: Name of the source column being validated.

name: target_column_name
description: Name of the target column being validated.

name: validation_type
description: Type of validation performed [row, count, sum, avg, min, max]

name: source_agg_value
description: Aggregated value from the source. Defaults to row count for row validations

name: target_agg_value
description: Aggregated value from the target. Defaults to row count for row validations

name: count_differences
description: Count of differences between source and target rows for row validation

name: max_differences
description: Maximum differences between source and target rows for row validation

name: stddev_differences
description: Standard deviation of differences between source and target rows for row validation
